description: This is a health insurance claim form that contains patient and insurance details

phone_number.instruction: The phone number of the provider

insured's_id_number.instruction: The ID number of the insured person

patient's_birth_date.instruction: The birth date of the patient in MM/DD/YY format

patient's_sex.instruction: The sex of the patient, either 'M' or 'F'

insured's_name.instruction: The name of the insured person

patient's_address.instruction: The address details of the patient

insured's_address.instruction: The address details of the insured person

patient_relationship_to_insured.instruction: The relationship of the patient to the insured person, e.g. 'Self', 'Spouse', 'Child', 'Other'

patient_status.instruction: The status of the patient, e.g. 'Single', 'Married', 'Other'

patient_employment_status.instruction: The employment status of the patient, e.g. 'Employed', 'Full-Time Student', 'Part-Time Student'

other_insured's_name.instruction: The name of any other insured person

insured's_policy_group_or_feca_number.instruction: The policy group or FECA number of the insured person

condition_related_to_employment.instruction: Whether the patient's condition is related to employment

condition_related_to_auto_accident.instruction: Whether the patient's condition is related to an auto accident

condition_related_to_other_accident.instruction: Whether the patient's condition is related to another type of accident

other_health_benefit_plan.instruction: Whether there is another health benefit plan

insured's_or_authorized_person's_signatu.instruction: The signature of the insured person or their authorized representative
The date of the insured person's or their authorized representative's signature in MM/DD/YYYY format

patient's_or_authorized_person's_signatu.instruction: The signature of the patient or their authorized representative
The date of the patient's or their authorized representative's signature in MM/DD/YYYY format

date_of_current_illness,_injury,_or_preg.instruction: The date of the current illness, injury, or pregnancy in MM/DD/YYYY format

first_date_of_same_or_similar_illness.instruction: The first date of the same or similar illness in MM/DD/YYYY format

referring_physician_name.instruction: The name of the referring physician

referring_physician_id_number.instruction: The ID number of the referring physician

diagnosis_codes.instruction: The diagnosis codes related to the patient's condition

medicaid_resubmission_code.instruction: The Medicaid resubmission code, if applicable

prior_authorization_number.instruction: The prior authorization number, if applicable

federal_tax_id_number.instruction: The federal tax ID number of the provider

total_charge.instruction: The total charge for the services provided

amount_paid.instruction: The amount paid for the services

balance_due.instruction: The balance due for the services

provider_signature_date.instruction: The date of the provider's signature in MM/DD/YYYY format

provider_name,_address,_and_phone_number.instruction: The name, address, and phone number of the provider
